attributes.action: Ban all sale of alcohol in the Palace of Westminster.
attributes.additional_details:
The decisions made in this place can affect millions. They can even result in the difference between life and death.
That these lige-changing decisions could be potentially blurred by the intake of alcohol cannot be tolerated.
It is a place of WORK.
attributes.background: To forbid all sale of alcoholic beveredges within The Palace of Westminster and it's grounds.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban alcohol in the Houses of Parliament and all government buildings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101
